name: GroundWork
description:
This is a project about a mining game where you gather resources and can create new crafting stations and new items,

Right now you can FIND a treasure chest (nothing to collect at the moment that is coming), you can mine dirt and pick up ores.

 if you are full on ores you can’t pick up or mine them, then you need to deposit them in your chest, ones the chest is full there is no more to do in this prototype at the moment

just as a little fun thing every time you start over you get 1 out of a random 4 hats :) if there is a hat you want then you can press R until you get it.

PLANED

  • actual loot chest
  • bigger worlds 
  • seed-based world generation
  • crafting
  • tools (of different strengths)
  • structures (like : walls, doors, light,)
  • enemy
  • more items to craft with
  • crafting benches (furnace, anvil, cauldron, handcrafting)

[This game has a really small chance to make it without support, if you want to see this game in a finished state please consider support its development and me, thank you]
